sourcesContent:
export const mockRecipes = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Classic Spaghetti Carbonara",
    ingredients: ["spaghetti", "eggs", "bacon", "parmesan cheese", "black pepper"],
    cuisine: "italian",
    diet: "",
    meal: "dinner",
    cookTime: 20,
    servings: 4,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 650,
      protein: "25g",
      carbs: "60g",
      fat: "30g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all ingredients."
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: "Vegetarian Buddha Bowl",
    ingredients: ["quinoa", "chickpeas", "avocado", "spinach", "sweet potato", "tahini"],
    cuisine: "mediterranean",
    diet: "vegetarian",
    meal: "lunch",
    cookTime: 35,
    servings: 2,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 520,
      protein: "18g",
      carbs: "65g",
      fat: "20g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Roast sweet potato. 2. Cook quinoa. 3. Prepare tahini dressing. 4. Assemble bowl."
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: "Chicken Tacos",
    ingredients: ["chicken breast", "tortillas", "lime", "cilantro", "onion", "avocado"],
    cuisine: "mexican",
    diet: "",
    meal: "dinner",
    cookTime: 25,
    servings: 4,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 380,
      protein: "28g",
      carbs: "35g",
      fat: "15g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Season and cook chicken. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Prepare toppings. 4. Assemble tacos."
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: "Avocado Toast",
    ingredients: ["bread", "avocado", "lemon", "salt", "pepper"],
    cuisine: "american",
    diet: "vegetarian",
    meal: "breakfast",
    cookTime: 5,
    servings: 1,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 320,
      protein: "8g",
      carbs: "25g",
      fat: "22g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado. 3. Season with lemon, salt, pepper. 4. Spread on toast."
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: "Asian Stir Fry",
    ingredients: ["broccoli", "carrots", "soy sauce", "garlic", "ginger", "rice"],
    cuisine: "asian",
    diet: "vegan",
    meal: "dinner",
    cookTime: 15,
    servings: 3,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 280,
      protein: "12g",
      carbs: "45g",
      fat: "8g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Cook rice. 2. Heat oil in wok. 3. Stir fry vegetables. 4. Add sauce and serve."
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: "Greek Salad",
    ingredients: ["tomatoes", "cucumber", "olives", "feta cheese", "olive oil", "oregano"],
    cuisine: "mediterranean",
    diet: "vegetarian",
    meal: "lunch",
    cookTime: 10,
    servings: 2,
    nutrition: {
      calories: 250,
      protein: "8g",
      carbs: "12g",
      fat: "20g"
    },
    instructions: "1. Chop vegetables. 2. Add olives and feta. 3. Dress with olive oil. 4. Season with oregano."
  }
];
